name: Bolinas.github.io
tagline: Rule Extraction and Parsing Tools for Synchronous Hyperedge Replacement Grammars
body:
### Welcome to Bolinas.

You can find our repository here: [Bolinas](https://www.github.com/karlmoritz/bolinas)

To clone the code (read-only), use the following command:

    git clone git://github.com/karlmoritz/bolinas.git

If you are interested in contributing to the code, please fork a copy of the repository and then check-in any updates via a pull request.

### About Bolinas

Bolinas is a set of tools for manipulating and using hyperedge replacement grammars. For more details on usage, see the documentation in the code - a longer README file and documentation are currently being prepared.

### Related Publications

* **Parsing Graphs with Hyperedge Replacement Grammars.** [David Chiang](http://www.isi.edu/~chiang/), [Jacob Andreas](http://jacobandreas.net), [Daniel Bauer](http://www.cs.columbia.edu/~bauer/), [Karl Moritz Hermann](http://www.karlmoritz.com/), [Bevan Jones](http://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/s1051107/), [Kevin Knight](http://www.isi.edu/~knight/). _In Proceedings of the 51st Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (Volume 1: Long Papers)._ Association for Computational Linguistics. Sofia, Bulgaria. (Forthcoming)

* **Semantics-Based Machine Translation with Hyperedge Replacement Grammars.** [Bevan Jones*](http://homepages.inf.ed.ac.uk/s1051107/), [Jacob Andreas*](http://jacobandreas.net), [Daniel Bauer*](http://www.cs.columbia.edu/~bauer/), [Karl Moritz Hermann*](http://www.karlmoritz.com/), [Kevin Knight](http://www.isi.edu/~knight/). _In Proceedings of COLING 2012._ pp. 1359â€“1376. The COLING 2012 Organizing Committee. Mumbai, India. (*Joint first author in randomized order)

### Authors

* Jacob Andreas @jacobandreas
* Daniel Bauer @daniel-bauer
* David Chiang @davidweichiang
* Karl Moritz Hermann @karlmoritz
* Bevan Jones @bevankj
* Kevin Knight @kevincrawfordknight
